speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Jason from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing fine, thank you. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your account with City Bank. To ensure I’m speaking with the right person, could you verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I have verified your information. You currently have an outstanding balance of $250. How do you wish to proceed with payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay half today and the rest next month.

speaker: Agent
text: That works. Would you like to pay the first installment online?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, online is fine with me.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you! I’ll send you a link to complete the payment. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that’s all for now. Thank you!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day.
